results.title: Film still from John Heyer’s The Back of Beyond
results.brief_description: The Realist Film Unit was formed in 1945 and produced social realist documentaries that highlighted workers’ rights and social issues. From 1948, the Shell Film Unit began making trade and educational films and, in 1954, produced John Heyer’s seminal documentary The Back of Beyond.
results.title_for_label: Film still from John Heyer’s The Back of Beyond
results.description: The Realist Film Unit was formed in 1945 and produced social realist documentaries that highlighted workers’ rights and social issues. From 1948, the Shell Film Unit began making trade and educational films and, in 1954, produced John Heyer’s seminal documentary The Back of Beyond.
description_for_label: The Realist Film Unit was formed in 1945 and produced social realist documentaries that highlighted workers’ rights and social issues. From 1948, the Shell Film Unit began making trade and educational films and, in 1954, produced John Heyer’s seminal documentary The Back of Beyond.
